overview: Matt leads Voltaix on a daily basis with full profit and loss responsibility. Matt joined Voltaix in 2003 and has 11 years of experience commercializing new technologies in the advanced materials, semiconductor, and solar industries. He holds a Ph.D. in Chemistry from the U. of Wisconsin-Madison and completed an M.B.A. at INSEAD (Singapore) and the Wharton School of Business. He graduated magna cum laude from Wabash College, and was elected to Phi Beta Kappa. Matt is the inventor of several chemical process technologies and holds three U.S. patents.
